front.title: IEEE Draft Standard Requirements, Terminology, and Test Procedures for Neutral Grounding Devices

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This standard applies to devices used f 1 or the purpose of controlling the ground current or the potentials to ground of an alternating current system. These devices are: groundingtransformers, ground-fault neutralizers, resistors, reactors, or combinations of these.
